info.name: No more YouTube SIDEBAR ads
info.description:
Knocking out YouTube SIDEBAR ads.  Currently, this just removes the ads that started to show on the side list of videos. 

In the picture, it has a yellow box around it.  Not shown in this picture is  a small "i" inside a white dot at the upper right corner for info on Google ads (I cropped the picture too narrow).  This is the ad that gets removed.
